explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

flammable_liquids.rationale: There is no flash point (Lange (14th, 1992) p.1.232) or it is nonflammable. (ICSC(J) (2004) and Hommmel (1991) Card No.942)

self_reactive_substances.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive or self-reactive properties present in the molecule.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures, which in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

oxidizing_liquids.rationale: Organic compounds containing no oxygen, fluorine and chlorine.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: SPECIES: Rat (male) ENDPOINT: LD50 VALUE: 51 mg/kg REFERENCE SOURCE: Agricultural Chemicals abstracts

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: since rabbit LD50 value: >2000mg/kg and there was no death at 2000mg/kg or less (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was set as the outside of Category.

acute_toxicity_inhalation_vapor.rationale: Rat LC50 (4 hours) value: 691ppm (equivalent of 4 mg/L) (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), and 691ppm indicates steam with almost no mist from vapor pressure, it was classified as Category 3 by the ppm concentration standard.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Since the moderate irritation was observed with 4 hour exposure in the skin irritation test on rabbits (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was classified as Category 2.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Since very strong stimulativeness was indicated in the eye irritation test result using a rabbit and it did not recover completely during the observation period for 21 days (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was set as Category 1.

respiratory_skin_sensitizer.classification: Respiratory sensitization: Classification not possible; Skin sensitization: Not classified
respiratory_skin_sensitizer.rationale: Respirator: No data Skin: Since the positive rate was less than 30% in Maximization test using the guinea pigs (Agricultural Chemicals abstracts), it was put outside of the Category.

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Since we found a negative result in the micronucleus test which used the mouse red corpuscles, which was the in vivo mutagenicity test using the somatic cells (Agrichemical Abstracts), we classified it as Out Of Category.

carcinogenicity.rationale: Since it was classified into the group 3 (IARC 71, 1999) according to IARC, it carried out the outside of Category.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: Since there is no obvious reproductive toxicity in the dose causing general toxicity to parent animals in inhalation exposure to pregnant rabbit and in the rat inhalation exposure reproduction study (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was considered as on the outside of Categry.

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause respiratory irritation or may cause drowsiness and dizziness (narcotic effects, respiratory tract irritation)
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: In the acute neurotoxicity test by inhalation exposures with rats, mild and transcient effects on nerve systems and symptoms suggesting airway irritation such as shallow respiration, droopy eyelids, hyper salivation, gasping, hunchback position, gait disorder, slight incoordination of air recovery reflection, lack of response to fright reactions, decrease of Lotta load movements coordination, decrease of movements and locomotor activities etc. were observed (Agricultural chemical abstracts). So it was set as Category 3 (airway irritation, anesthetic action).

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause damage to organs (thyroid gland, respiratory organs) through prolonged or repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: It was classified to Category 2 (thyroid gland, respiratory organs) since retention increases of thyroidal follicular clloid and involved thinning of the follicular ephitheliocyte in the oral study using mice, colloid depletion in thyroid gland and hypertrophy follicle cell in the oral study using dogs, and follicular cell hyperplasia and cytoplasmic vacuolization of follicular cell in thyroidal folliclar cell and olfactory-epithelium degeneration of nose in the inhalation exposure test using rats were acknowledged respectively with the given dose of the guidance value range of Category 2 (Agricultural Chemicals abstracts).
